meanings.definition: Making a light, metallic ringing sound.
meanings.sent1: The jinglier bells on the cat's collar helped us locate her easily.
meanings.sent2: The wind chime became even jinglier as the breeze picked up.
meanings.sent3: The jinglier noise of the tambourine made the toddler giggle.
meanings.sent4: The jinglier sound of the coins in the jar reminded her of her childhood piggy bank.
meanings.sent5: The jinglier notes of the music box filled the room with a magical atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The jinglier tambourine added a festive touch to the music.
meanings.sent2: The new wind chimes were much jinglier than the old ones.
meanings.sent3: The jinglier bells on the reindeer's harness made him stand out in the parade.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter became even jinglier as she listened to the comedian's jokes.
meanings.sent5: The jinglier tones of the piano echoed through the concert hall.
